DOC.detailed_description: Observational Objectives : To describe safety evaluate vaccine , give two-dose schedule accordance Package Insert , child age ≥ 6 month ≤ 36 months,6th 12th birthday ≥ 60th birthday . To describe immunogenicity evaluate vaccine , give two-dose schedule accordance Package Insert , child age ≥ 6 month ≤ 36 month , 6th 12th birthday ≥ 60rd birthday .
